name: preparation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX970, ATI/AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX480
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Guardian Master VR is a fast-paced and casual MOBA
